attributes.action: Make the EMA payment scale equal and set to £30 a week for everyone eligible
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Currently, pupils considered to be in a more wealthy family are being discriminated against with the EMA system. Poorer pupils are getting £30, of which they end up spending completely, resulting in having no money each week anyway.

The pay scale should be scrapped and all who have a household income of under £35,000 should be awarded £30 a week WITH the bonuses that are currently available. This makes the system much fairer and more open.

I hope you can support this petition and make it go somewhere, it will make a difference.
